Karim Ahmed Kassem (Arabic: , Kareem Ahmad Qassem, Egyptian Arabic: , nke a na-akpọkwa Karim Assem; a mụrụ na 8 Ọktoba 1986) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri.
A mụrụ Karim na 8th nke October 1986 na Cairo, Egypt
Ọ bụ onye Alakụba n'onwe ya ọ bụ ezie na o nwere ọtụtụ okpukpe na-azụlite na-eme ememe ezumike ndị Juu, Ndị Kraịst na ndị Alakụba niile dịka nwatakịrị
Nne ya nwụrụ anwụ bụ onye Juu na nna ya bụ onye Alakụba ma sitere na nketa okwukwe Alakụba na nke Ndị Kraịst
Nna nna ya bụ onye Alakụba na nne nne ya bụ Onye Kraịst
Nna nna ya bụ onye Juu na-emegide ndị Zionist nke jụrụ ịkwaga Israel, na-ekwere na Zionism bụ òtù "ịkpa ókè agbụrụ". Nna nna ya bụ onye ama ama n'Ijipt.

Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum America dị na Cairo, ebe ọ gụrụ ihe nkiri ma mee ihe nkiri n'ọtụtụ egwuregwu mahadum. Ọ na-asụ asụsụ atọ na Egyptian Arabic (nke a na-akpọkwa Standard Arabic), French na Bekee.

Achọpụtara ya n'afọ 2006 mgbe ọ na-eme ihe nkiri, o nwere ọganihu ihe nkiri ya na ihe nkiri ọgwụ ọjọọ Awqat Faragh nke pụtara "Oge dị mma". Kassem na onye ọrụ ibe ya Amr Abed esorola mee ihe nkiri atọ n'ime ihe nkiri ya.
